author: deweese
msg: 1) Added Support for preserveAlpha in feConvolveMatrix
4) Fixed createRendering returning null bugs in MaskRable&FilterAsAlphaRable

author: billh
msg: Added new TextSpanLayout implementation that does not use TextLayout
(GlyphLayout).  Modified TextLayoutFactory to return this layout type
when X, Y, ROTATION attributes are specified in tspan/tref.

author: deweese
msg: * Added support for PadMode REPLICATE (AKA duplicate) in PadRed.java
* Fixed a bug in ConcreteBackgroundRable for the case where there
was no child of node with background-enable:true before the child
* Fixed a few constants in SVGConstants.
* Switched FeConvolveMatrix on (new bridge, almost finished implementation).
Still needs to handle bias (hard), and preserveAlpha (tricky but not
* Fixed a few documentation bugs in GaussianBlurRable
